Comment: The way this headline is written is part of the reason why we got here:  The media has normalized Trump and his behavior. This headline reads as if seeking a third term is a thing. It’s not a thing. It’s illegal. The context is insane. It should read “Trump changes his mind on blatantly breaking the law and ignoring the constitution.”   A similar type of headline could also read: Sean Diddy Combs decides not to attend Monday night’s Met Gala
